Quanita Adams bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri bi na Cape Town, South Africa
O meela ihe nkiri Forgiveness (2004, ya na Arnold Vosloo), Cape of Good Hope (2004) na Skeem (2011)
Ọ pụtara n'elu nkwago na egwuregwu ndị a ma ama, gụnyere Truth in Translation na At Her Feet

Ọ bụ onye mmeri afọ 2008 nke Fleur du Cap Theatre Award for Best Supporting Actress maka ọrụ ya na Cissie, onye mmeri afọ 2004 nke Fleur du Cap Theatre Award for Best Actress for Valley Song' na At Her Feet, na onye mmeri afọ 2003 nke Fleur du Cap Theatre Award for Best Ensemble for For Colored Girls
Quanita na-arụkwa ọrụ nke Nne Laetitia na ihe nkiri kyknet nke SAFTA, Arendsvlei
Ọzọkwa, Adams mepụtara usoro telivishọn Riveiria, dabere na nwa agbọghọ ọkwa 7 na-etolite n'oge Apartheid, yana Vinkel en Koljander.
